name: La Colonia
description: La Colonia is a historic neighborhood in Coachella known for its rich cultural heritage and close-knit community. Featuring a variety of homes, this area offers a glimpse into the city's vibrant history and a welcoming atmosphere.

name: Rancho Las Flores
description: Rancho Las Flores is a family-friendly residential area featuring a mix of single-family homes and townhouses. Known for its affordability and peaceful streets, this community is ideal for those seeking a suburban lifestyle in Coachella.
keywords: Rancho Las Flores homes for sale

name: Sierra Vista
description: Sierra Vista is a suburban neighborhood offering a variety of housing styles, from single-family homes to townhouses. Residents enjoy proximity to parks and schools, making it a great choice for families.

name: Las Plumas
description: Las Plumas is a quiet residential neighborhood offering affordable single-family homes with spacious yards. This community is ideal for families seeking a tranquil and welcoming environment.

name: Bella Canto
description: Bella Canto is a family-friendly neighborhood featuring single-family homes with modern designs and spacious layouts. Located near parks and schools, this community offers a vibrant and welcoming atmosphere.

name: Somerset
description: Somerset is a charming neighborhood featuring single-family homes with spacious floor plans and private yards. This family-friendly community offers a relaxed atmosphere with close proximity to schools, parks, and shopping centers.
